version_description:
Thank you for choosing Bank of Cyprus Mobile Banking App. The new Mobile Banking App for smartphones and tablets, has a fresh and modern design that makes it easier to manage your accounts and perform your banking transactions. It’s easy to use, making your navigation and usage enjoyable and simple for actions such as checking your balance, transferring money, paying bills and carrying out lots of other banking transactions.

To get started, simply download or update our Bank of Cyprus App, login to 1bank using your User ID and Passcode or use your biometrics, for a quick and secure access to your accounts.

Enjoy your new banking experience!

Thank you for choosing Bank of Cyprus Mobile Banking App. The new Mobile Banking App for smartphones and tablets, has a fresh and modern design that makes it easier to manage your accounts and perform your banking transactions. It’s easy to use, making your navigation and usage enjoyable and simple for actions such as checking your balance, transferring money, paying bills and carrying out lots of other banking transactions.

To get started, simply download or update our Bank of Cyprus App, login to 1bank using your User ID and Passcode or use your biometrics, for a quick and secure access to your accounts.

Enjoy your new banking experience!

It is now easier to find what you are looking for through our new search feature. Just write one or more keywords and we will present you with all the relevant information and functions of our app.
This version also includes changes that enhance your security. By logging in successfully, your device will be added to your list of trusted devices in order to make your future logins smoother.

Your online card transactions are getting even more secure. As per EU regulations the use of SMS One Time Passwords is being discontinued and replaced by push notifications. Activate and manage the option within our app.

Use the BoC Mobile App and join us. The hustle and bustle of daily life rarely leaves enough time to get everything done. We at Bank of Cyprus know just how complex life can be - so we're making your life simpler with the BoC Mobile Banking App. Now, you can use the BoC Mobile Banking App on your mobile phone to become a new client. No need to visit a bank branch. Opening an account a client is fast, easy and secure.
